section1.title: Introduction
section1.content: Explore the world of AI and Machine Learning

sectionAbout.info.1: Hello! My name is Guilherme. I have a degree in Computer Engineering from the State University of Ponta Grossa (UEPG) and work as a fullstack developer. My expertise lies in developing robust backends using C#, while on the frontend, I focus on delivering dynamic experiences with JavaScript and React.
sectionAbout.info.2: I have experience in developing APIs and process automation (RPA). Currently, I am steering my career towards areas such as MLOps and Artificial Intelligence. I believe that learning Cloud Computing is essential for this transition, and I am constantly seeking new ways to expand my technical and professional knowledge.
